r.s: Cowiki parser and renderer for Text_Wiki
r.d:
Note: coWiki has been offically discontinued. This package is being kept to allow conversion of coWiki syntax to other wiki markups.
Parses coWiki mark-up to tokenize the text for Text_Wiki rendering and also renders for wiki conversion.
See: http://cowiki.org/
r.n: coWiki is no longer maintained. Please use this package only for conversion of coWiki syntax to other markups.
